message.body: stuff
Alright I have moved
quick question. I like the whole being able to favorite sites on your site list on the landing page, but it doesn't stay that way after a while. Do you know what is up with that?
probably proxy.
its not exactly proxy, its more like I ssh to a machine that has zn. Basically the same thing?
@yilmazerkan I'm running zn, still need to setup my keys for ssh tho. I made the setup like this so sites I visit are continuously seeded (:
but yeah localstorage? alright I guess bookmarks would be the way then.
thanks!
i come from the other side, where the progressive stack is enforced. either way, shits fucked
you're discriminated by your privilege level, as denoted by your position in the progressive stack
if you're white cis christian male, you have the highest privilege, and would be at the bottom of the progressive stack
sup ifmu!
basically it looks like extremism breeds discrimination no matter what side you're on
@basxto I don't exactly agree with the stack being used for speaking order, but more extreme sides of the progressivism tend to use the stack to discriminate
Religious freedom topic, I thought the separation of church and state should've been enough
@ifmu Bored with work, I'm thinking of making another zite later today. how bout you?
@yilmazerkan: another web browser game. I won't go into detail quite yet, but all I need right now is time and something to motivate me
@ifmu: oh no I mean another as in another one apart from the existing ones on zn already. First time making a game
@yilmazerkan: AAHHH.
I like the idea of mmo, but it has to be turn based
unless webrtc is coupled in this
@basxto: yeah. Making new ground here, but I think the tools we need exist. Its just a matter of channeling @yilmazerkan's motivation
@basxto: that works out i think. maybe a blockchain based turn game would do it
I broke pron.0chan trying to give back to the community. I'm so sorry
wait it works??? crap, maybe something broke on my end. Whenever I try to access it, when it fully loads, its blank. When I try to delete it, It says I own the site...
oh well I learned my lesson. 5 images per week
@yilmazerkan: good luck. I'm behind seven proxies
cx

@yilmazerkan: i think once I get the webgame going on my end, I should have enough content to work with
I'm probably gonna start today. I was busy last night with work.
I heard of the brussels stuff from this 1000 replied thread from 4chaen
(I originally came ZN to separate myself from that site, but so far not successful)
I usually get my news from /pol/ but I try not to stay there too long.
It's not good for my health
yeah, but I live in a place where nothing literally happens. This probably looks good for some though. Nice and peaceful.
oh yeah no doubt. I was looking into the 1992 LA riots recently and that basically reaffirms news as propaganda
I get that feeling. How did we reach a point where it isn't the even that makes you feel bad, but its reporting
haha oh wow #stopislam is trending
this kinda sucks. I have a close friend who is a muslim, so I kinda have split feelings about this. more and more my experience seems to be anecdotal and an exception
I think militant islamism covers it just about right
problem is even if it isn't the reason, if done right it is the enabler. Most of the more militant sects always have a sort of us-againts-them mentality
I think the problem is we can't sort out the people who take religion too seriously from those who are moderates. That would be discrimination
That works for an individual level, but what about in groups of people migrating? Would it be logistically feasable?
I think... maybe not just religion, but a whole host of characteristics should be at play.
@yilmazerkan: Ah well in retrospect, yeah I agree. Otherwise, i would've shunned my close friend
I'll be right back. gonna get some food
ok im back and wot
anyways where was I... ah yes shits fucked
I think that about sums up whats going on right now. I don't exactly know what else is going on in brussels so I'll probably just go back to working on that one game

I'm not exactly looking at it directly since im working on game now
its most likely flash
@yilmazerkan: what are the chances apple's statement is just to appease the public?
I'm only listening cause I like hearing what the guys are saying on the ground

making a multiplayer game is harder than I thought
yeah thats also why I started of just making a modified version of chat
